comments.content:
The flower looks like a Bouncing Betty just popped out of a hole in the ground and fragged an entire platoon.   
   
Definitely open to misinterpretation.

It's nice to stimulate hope and positivism, but   
I think a more serious logo would be more   
appropriate for this program. These colors lend   
themselves to a toy company rather than an   
operation to rid the world of such a tragic threat.   
   
Stephen

...and I dreamed of big wide open fields, full of flowers. Walking down the hill I encountered a white horse, which talked to me in a whisperering voice. He said ...   
   
I am with Stephen, the designer missed the clue by at least a mile.   
   
Jacques
